{
    "pattern": "SELECT <select_parameter> FROM <dml_values_parameter> WHERE <where_parameter>",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<select_parameter>",
        "<dml_values_parameter>",
        "<where_parameter>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "SELECT, DISTINCT, FROM, read_parquet, invalid file input",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The presence of hidden files generated by Spark is causing the query to fail due to invalid input, as the read_parquet function cannot process these files."
}
